data_sources.description: TIF images from Mayo Clinic strip AI test dataset.

data_variables.name: image_paths
data_variables.description: List of paths to the TIF images.

data_variables.name: image
data_variables.description: Single image loaded from the image_paths.

data_variables.name: tiles
data_variables.description: Array of image tiles created from the loaded image.

data_flow.creation: Generated by listing TIF files in the specified directory.
data_flow.flow: Used to load images for processing.

data_flow.creation: Created using the load_image function that reads and resizes the image.
Generated using the make_tiles function, which pads the image and extracts tiles.
data_flow.flow: Each tile is displayed and can be further processed or analyzed.
